Dear [Sender's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to you in response to the email you accidentally sent containing classified information. I understand that you have requested me to delete the email, but I regret to inform you that I cannot comply with your request.

As a responsible and ethical government contractor, I believe that it is my duty to act in the public interest. I understand that this decision may have consequences, and I am willing to face any repercussions that may arise. However, I cannot in good conscience ignore the public's right to know. I hope you will understand my position and the importance of transparency in government.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to address this situation.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
